com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise

Interface IStatePortProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatePortProvider

    public interface IStatePortProvider
    Provides access to states ports of a controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStatePortData(String statePortName, StatePortData statePortData)
      Adds the provided state port data to the existing port.
      void addStatePortListener(IStatePortListener listener)
      Adds the specified listener to state port events.
      Collection<StatePortData> collectStatePortData()
      Updates the states of all state ports of sunrise.
      List<StatePortData> getAllStatePortData()
      Returns all current state port data without refreshing it.
      StatePortData getStatePortData(String statePortName)
      Gets the data of the specified StatePort by name.
      void removeStatePortData(String statePortName, StatePortData statePortData)
      Removes the state port data that was added by addStatePortData(String, StatePortData) from the existing state port.
      void removeStatePortListener(IStatePortListener listener)
      Removes the specified listener for state port events.

    • Method Detail

      • collectStatePortData

        Collection<StatePortData> collectStatePortData()
        Updates the states of all state ports of sunrise. Fires change event for every state port queried.
        Returns:
        the states of all state ports of sunrise.

      • getAllStatePortData

        List<StatePortData> getAllStatePortData()
        Returns all current state port data without refreshing it.
        Returns:
        A List of StatePortData values.

      • getStatePortData

        StatePortData getStatePortData(String statePortName)
        Gets the data of the specified StatePort by name.

        Uses the cache if possible. If not in cache, requests data from Sunrise and updates cache.

        Parameters:
        statePortName - name of the StatePort
        Returns:
        StatePortData for the specified state port or null if not present or not possible to query.

      • addStatePortListener

        void addStatePortListener(IStatePortListener listener)
        Adds the specified listener to state port events.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener that reacts to events from state ports.

      • addStatePortData

        void addStatePortData(String statePortName,
                      StatePortData statePortData)
        Adds the provided state port data to the existing port.
        Parameters:
        statePortName - the state port name.
        statePortData - the state port data.

      • removeStatePortData

        void removeStatePortData(String statePortName,
                         StatePortData statePortData)
        Removes the state port data that was added by addStatePortData(String, StatePortData) from the existing state port.
        Parameters:
        statePortName - the state port name.
        statePortData - the state port data.

      • removeStatePortListener

        void removeStatePortListener(IStatePortListener listener)
        Removes the specified listener for state port events.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to remove
